mapper.select: select city_name, platformid, store_name, rebuy_count, rebuy_20_count from ds_rebuycus where year =#{year} and month =#{month}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ds_rebuycus ( city_name, platformid,store_name, rebuy_count, rebuy_20_count, year,month,createtime ) VALUES( #{city_name},#{platformid},#{store_name},#{rebuy_count},#{rebuy_20_count}, YEAR(date_sub(now(),interval 1 month)), MONTH(date_sub(now(),interval 1 month)), NOW() )
mapper.delete: delete from ds_rebuycus where year =#{year} and month =#{month}
